retail.title: Register your business
retail.description: Register with Companies and Intellectual Property Commission (CIPC)

retail.title: Get a tax number
retail.description: Register for income tax and VAT with SARS

retail.title: Open a business bank account
retail.description: Separate your business and personal finances

retail.title: Get retail licenses
retail.description: Obtain municipal trading license and any industry-specific permits

retail.title: Register for UIF and SDL
retail.description: Register employees for Unemployment Insurance Fund and Skills Development Levy
retail.cost_estimate: 1% of payroll for UIF, 1% for SDL
